definitions: having the form or appearance of a mesh or network
shortDefinitions: having form or appearance of mesh or network

definitions: (of a geometric object) represented by an arrangement of a finite number of geometric components
shortDefinitions: (of geometric object) represented by arrangement of finite number of geometric components

definitions: (of a computer network) consisting of nodes which are each linked to the network via two or more connections, each node typically being connected (directly or indirectly) to every other node
shortDefinitions: (of computer network) consisting of nodes which are each linked to network via two or more connections
